issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This can show for multiple things; should be handled better

fields.summary: annoying exceptions from LLAP Jmx view in the logs

comments.body: A tiny patch. [~jdere] can you take a look? thnx
Committed to master. Thanks for the review!
This jira is resolved and released with Hive 3.0 If you find an issue with it, please create a new jira.
